title: Graham Lewis

title: Teaching
text:
As a teacher, I tailor my teaching style to the material being covered. Some techniques are best conveyed with examples and practice problems, others are suited more for detailed explanation and analysis. All lessons require careful preparation. A central component of my teaching style is reinforcement, I strive to create an engaging classroom where students have multiple passes through each concept. This is enhanced through visual representations, intuitive explanations, and practice problems.
Probably another paragraph.
